summary: Completed comprehensive testing of T.H.U.G N HOMEBASE ENT. mega recording studio app. Frontend UI works well with successful user registration and navigation, but backend API design issues prevent core functionality (project creation, contract creation) from working properly.

critical_bugs.issue: API expects both Pydantic model and form parameters, but frontend sends only FormData. Returns 422 error.
API expects both Pydantic model and form parameters, but frontend sends only FormData. Returns 422 error.
API expects both Pydantic model and form parameters, but frontend sends only FormData. Returns 422 error.
critical_bugs.impact: Blocks sound pack creation functionality completely

integration_issues.issue: Create Project button triggers API call but fails due to backend 422 error
integration_issues.user_impact: Users cannot create new recording projects

integration_issues.issue: Create Contract button triggers API call but fails due to backend 422 error

working_features: Landing page displays correctly with T.H.U.G N HOMEBASE ENT. branding
Get Started button opens authentication modal properly
User registration form works with all fields (username, email, full_name, is_artist checkbox)
After registration, user is redirected to studio dashboard
Studio dashboard shows user profile information correctly
All navigation tabs work properly (Studio, Sound Packs, Contracts, Profile)
Profile tab displays user information correctly
Sound pack library displays (empty but functional)
Contract system UI is present and functional

passed_tests: Landing page loads with correct branding
Authentication modal opens on Get Started button click
Redirect to studio dashboard after registration

success_percentage.backend: 55% (6/11 endpoints working - GET operations work, POST operations fail)
success_percentage.frontend: 80% (UI and navigation work perfectly, but creation features fail due to backend issues)

action_item_for_E1: CRITICAL: Fix backend API design inconsistency. The endpoints /api/projects, /api/contracts, and /api/soundpacks expect both Pydantic models AND form parameters, but the frontend sends only FormData. Either modify the backend to accept only FormData OR modify the frontend to send the expected format. This is blocking all creation functionality.
